_meta.description: Posting history - tracks what content was posted to which groups

anaheim_connect.notes: First live test post - pending admin approval. Only confirmed post from first batch.

oc_city_neighbors.notes: GHOST POST - Agent reported success but diagnostic confirmed NO post by Brandon in group feed. Modal likely had loading placeholder issue.

oc_word_of_mouth.notes: GHOST POST - Agent reported success but post not found. Text had formatting issues. React state likely never updated.

regional_placentia.notes: GHOST POST - Agent reported success but post not found. Modal loading placeholder issue likely.

fullerton_friends.notes: GHOST POST - Agent reported success but post not found. Modal loading placeholder issue likely.

orange_county_general.notes: FAILED - JS querySelector grabbed comment textbox instead of post modal editor. 3 empty posts created. NEEDS MANUAL CLEANUP.

oc_daily_post.notes: FAILED - Facebook refused to load (stuck on loading logo). Rate-limited after rapid posting.

garden_grove_whats_going_on.notes: VERIFIED SUCCESS - Used ?_fb_noscript=1 fix. Post submitted, confirmed 'pending admin approval'. Text entered correctly, Post button activated, JS click worked. First post using fixed approach.

oc_city_neighbors_v2.notes: SUCCESS_PUBLISHED - Post visible in feed (not pending). Used ?_fb_noscript=1 + JS Post click. Text has literal backslash-n formatting issue - Browser Use input action does not convert backslash-n to newlines. Line-by-line Shift+Enter approach worked but agent ran out of steps and fell back to single input. NEEDS: delete and repost with proper formatting.

anaheim_community.notes: SUCCESS_PUBLISHED - v3.2 first test. Post visible in feed. 10 steps, no fallbacks.

fun_in_fullerton.notes: SUCCESS_PUBLISHED - v3.2 second test. Same group where v3.0 FAILED. Post visible in feed. 10 steps, no fallbacks. Handled popup overlay (Woman's Club of Fullerton) gracefully.

anything_orange_county.notes: SUCCESS_PENDING - v3.2. Post submitted, pending admin approval. Agent handled Participation Review modal (new member questions) automatically. 22 steps total (JS IIFE wrapper issues caused retries, but text inserted and Post clicked successfully).

orange_county_beach.notes: LIKELY GHOST POST - Agent reported success but TEXT LENGTH was only 9 chars (expected 400+). execCommand('insertText') failed ~12 times in retry loop. Text never appeared in editor. Modal closed after Post click but post content almost certainly empty/wrong. Welcome modal for new member may have interfered. NEEDS MANUAL CHECK - delete any empty post if found.

oc_word_of_mouth_v2.notes: FAILED - execCommand('insertText') completely broken. 16+ steps of retries, text never appeared in editor. Same issue as orange_county_beach. Facebook may have changed editor implementation breaking execCommand approach. Need to switch to ClipboardEvent or native typing.

regional_placentia_v2.notes: FAILED - v3.3 test. Native input action typed text SUCCESSFULLY but JS Post button click returned POST_NOT_FOUND repeatedly. querySelector('div[role="dialog"]') can't find Post button. Facebook changed DOM structure. 20 steps, all Post click attempts failed.

fullerton_friends_v2.notes: FAILED - v3.3 test (no JS). Native input typed text OK. Agent tried clicking Post button by index but kept hitting 'Add to your post' icons instead. Index 10921 = 'Add to your post', NOT the submit button. Post button identification is the bottleneck. 15 steps burned on wrong clicks.

oc_daily_post_v2.notes: FAILED - v3.4 test. Native input typed text OK. JS with aria-label='Create post' + height>100 filter still returned NOT_FOUND. Issue: div[role='button'] selector wrong - Post button is NOT a div element. Direct click fallback kept hitting 'Add to your post'. Agent claimed success but modal was still open.

anything_oc.notes: SUCCESS_PUBLISHED - v3.5 BREAKTHROUGH! Used native input for text + .closest('[role=button]') JS for Post click. JS returned BUTTON_CLICKED, 'Posting' spinner appeared, modal closed, post visible in feed under Featured. 9 steps total. Key fix: find SPAN with 'Post' text then .closest() to button ancestor (button is NOT a div).

oc_word_of_mouth_v3.notes: SUCCESS_PUBLISHED - v3.5. Post visible in feed under Brandon Ruiz, 'Just now' timestamp. 11 steps. Mention dropdown appeared but agent dismissed it, navigated back from 'Add to your post' sub-menu, then JS .closest() Post click worked perfectly.

regional_placentia_v3.notes: SUCCESS_PENDING - v3.5. Post submitted, pending admin approval. Agent had to retype line-by-line (\n typed literally on first attempt). 14 steps. JS .closest() Post click worked, Posting spinner confirmed.

fullerton_friends_v3.notes: SUCCESS_PENDING - v3.5. Post submitted, pending admin approval. 'Thanks for your post!' toast visible. 11 steps. Text has literal \n characters - formatting issue with input action. JS .closest() Post click worked.

orange_county_general_v2.notes: SUCCESS_PUBLISHED - v3.5. Post visible in feed. 14 steps. Line-by-line typing with Enter keys = proper formatting. Mention dropdown dismissed by clicking modal header. JS .closest() Post click worked.

oc_daily_post_v3.notes: SUCCESS_PENDING - v3.5. Post submitted, pending admin approval. 13 steps. Clean line-by-line entry. JS returned BUTTON_CLICKED, Posting spinner confirmed.

orange_county_beach_v2.notes: SUCCESS_PENDING - v3.5. Post submitted, pending admin approval. 12 steps. Clean formatting.

oc_small_business.notes: FAILED - Browser Use credits ran out after 2 steps. Agent navigated to group but couldn't proceed. Need to retry when credits are replenished.
